commit.message:
Fix fallthrough attribute ignorance w/ -fsanitize=address (PR sanitizer/82792).

2017-11-08  Martin Liska  <mliska@suse.cz>

	PR sanitizer/82792
	* gimplify.c (expand_FALLTHROUGH_r): Skip IFN_ASAN_MARK.
2017-11-08  Martin Liska  <mliska@suse.cz>

	PR sanitizer/82792
	* g++.dg/asan/pr82792.C: New test.

From-SVN: r254519
